name: Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne
notes:
This should install WC3TFT for you with the installer from battle.net.
It will install the battlenet client first. When it's done with installing, log in before installing WC3. When you see the empty window where you should input your CD key, move it around until you see the field where you can type your CD key.

files.setup2: N/A:Select the installer for Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos

task.description:
Installing Blizzard App. An installer will open.
------------------------------
Log into your Blizzard account and keep the Blizzard app opened while installing Warcraft 3 TFT!
task.name: wineexec

task.description: Installing Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup: http://dist.blizzard.com/downloads/bna-installers/322d5bb9ae0318de3d4cde7641c96425/retail.1/Battle.net-Setup-enUS.exe
- setup2: 'N/A:Select the installer for Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos'
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Warcraft III/x86/Warcraft III.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating 64bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Arial font...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows 7 mode for Wine
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win7
- write_json:
    data:
      Client:
        GameLaunchWindowBehavior: '2'
        GameSearch:
          BackgroundSearch: 'true'
        HardwareAcceleration: 'false'
        Sound:
          Enabled: 'false'
        Streaming:
          StreamingEnabled: 'false'
    description: Writing a Battle.Net config file
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/Battle.net/Battle.net.config
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: 'Installing Blizzard App. An installer will open.

      ------------------------------

      Log into your Blizzard account and keep the Blizzard app opened while installing
      Warcraft 3 TFT!'
    exclude_processes: Battle.net.exe Agent.exe "Battle.net Helper.exe"
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
- task:
    description: 'Installing Warcraft III: The Frozen Throne'
    executable: setup2
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: compiler
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    d3d12: disabled
    nvapi: disabled
    nvapi64: disabled
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
